_header: Eke to the souls thy mercy
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A prayer to Christ by Dominus Iohannes arcuarius Canonicus Bodmine — six irregular couplets

BLHar2399.First Lines:
…Wyth rych…ffrom hynnys þu…Eke to
                    þe sowlys þy mercy…Gronte lord som remedy for þay
                    thenkyth…
BLHar2399.Last Lines:
…Gront to vs þy blysse euer lestyng
                    gracyowsse…Besechyng þe swete ihesu god almyȝhty ouer all
                    crstyn…
BLHar2399.Note: Partially illegible due to manuscript damage.
